title: FlaxbeardsSteamPower和ThermalFoundation冲突如何解决
author: 阿布测测吧
txt_content:
在制作DIY整合包，结果FSP蒸汽动力就和热力工厂起冲突
这是大概崩溃详情：[Client thread/ERROR] [FML]: Caught exception from Steamcraft
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: thermalfoundation/item/TFItems
        at flaxbeard.steamcraft.integration.ThermalFoundationIntegration.addThermalFoundationLiquid(ThermalFoundationIntegration.java:15) ~[ThermalFoundationIntegration.class:?]
        at flaxbeard.steamcraft.Steamcraft.postInit(Steamcraft.java:241) ~[Steamcraft.class:?]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_71]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLModContainer.handleModStateEvent(FMLModContainer.java:513) ~[forge-1.7.10-10.13.2.1291.jar:?]
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor4.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]


以及：Steamcraft{0.26.2} [Flaxbeard's Steam Power] (FlaxbeardsSteamPower-1.7.10-0.26.2.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Errored




求助

replies.author: junxian0608
replies.txt_content: 唯一的办法就是尝试更换版本，看看更老的或更新的版本能不能相互兼容

replies.author: 阿布测测吧
replies.txt_content:
junxian0608 发表于 2015-4-6 05:41
唯一的办法就是尝试更换版本，看看更老的或更新的版本能不能相互兼容
感谢帮助，已成功修复
